nodes.text: The Horizon Enterprises was a financial management corporation on Corellia at the time of the Galactic War. Horizon, led by its Senior Executive President Erin Kaldo, was the biggest corporation that allied with the reconstituted Sith Empire in the Battle of Corellia. However, while the Board of Directors and the rest of the company's upper management were willing to work with the Empire, Horizon's workforce had begun to rebel the moment they learned the Empire arrived. Kaldo and the directors were forced to call in Imperial help to "reduce" the workforce so a Sith agent suppressed the protest with force.
